verses.roman:
'śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya śacī-sūta guṇa-dhāma'
ei dhyāna, ei japa, laya ei nāma

synonyms: śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śacī-sūta—the son of mother Śacī; guṇa-dhāma—the reservoir of all good qualities; ei—this; dhyāna—meditation; ei—this; japa—chanting; laya—he takes; ei—this; nāma—holy name.
translation: The Bhaṭṭācārya always chanted the holy name of Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya, son of mother Śacī and reservoir of all good qualities. Indeed, chanting the holy names became his meditation.
